alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:11AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches with the highest amounts over Middle Park. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph with blowing snow and poor visibility. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
